name: WidowWhirl
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A daily short newsflash designed to enable widows to navigate their financial path forward. We will talk about technologies that will assist widows in their daily lives. With our years of experience, we'll talk about best strategies for different scenarios, review case studies, tax law and court cases. Our main goal is to help widows rise up and get back on their feet. Information is their greatest tool.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
